article: portuguese prime minister jose socrates said on thursday that national interests drove his decision to block a huge bid by telefonica of spain to buy part of brazilian telecom firm unk held by portugal telecom -lrb- pt -rrb- .
abstract: portugal defends veto on spanish telecom takeover
